name: JUNGVISUPRO
0:
”Alexa, set my bathroom to 22 degrees”
”Alexa, turn on the kitchen lighting”
”Alexa, turn on ceiling light”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use (German, DE)
des:
With the help of Alexa skills, you can control all the devices in your home that are networked with the JUNG Visu Pro software using voice commands (in addition to operation via smartphone or tablet). 

Prerequisites for the use of the skills are the local installation of the JUNG Visu Pro software and free registration on MyJUNG (www.jung.de/en/2402/service/myjung). 

After your registration, you create your Alexa installation, enter it in the JUNG Visu Pro software and select the required functions. Finally, you connect to your installation via the Alexa skill. 

Using the skill, you can define specific scenes or functions for your home: 
“Alexa, set my bathroom to 22 degrees” 
“Alexa, turn on the kitchen lighting” 
“Alexa, turn on ceiling light” 

Please contact the electrical installer of your choice to receive further information about JUNG Visu Pro.
